Title: Delfin Midstream agrees 1 mtpa LNG deal with Centrica over 15 years
Description: US LNG project developer Delfin Midstream has signed a deal valued at about $8 billion to supply 1 mtpa of LNG over 15 years on a free-on-board basis to British energy firm Centrica from its proposed Delfin LNG project in the Gulf of Mexico.
Author: CK

Title: TotalEnergies, Sonatrach agree to extend deal for LNG supplies to France by a year
Description: TotalEnergies and Sonatrach have agreed to extend an existing agreement for 2 mtpa of LNG by one year, with the supplies delivered in 2024 to France’s Fos Cavaou LNG receiving terminal in the Bouches-du-Rhone region.
Author: CK

Title: Cargo arrivals at Hong Kong’s LNG terminal show commercial operations are underway
Description: The 4 mtpa Hong Kong offshore LNG receiving terminal is poised to receive its third LNG cargo or second post-commissioning cargo, indicating the completion of the terminal’s commissioning phase and that the start of commercial operations is well underway.
Author: CK

Title: Berkshire Hathaway lifts interest in Cove Point LNG with stake purchase from Dominion Energy
Description: Berkshire Hathaway Energy has agreed to buy Dominion Energy’s 50% limited partner interest in the 5.25 mtpa Cove Point LNG export plant in Maryland for $3.3 billion in cash, boosting its interest to 75% upon execution of the deal.
Author: CK
